messages.message: The coffee machine shows an error message.
Grinder out of alignment. Error e1029. Please fix me!
Find a pc and log a call.
What would you like to drink?
Do you want milk or sugar?
The machine serves you your drink
Oof! What happened last night? I never remember these office parties. Oh well, maybe it's for the best
Wait, where did I put my keys? My wallet's gone too... Did I even lock my bike at all? I develop software for managing items for .. sake.
I have a splitting headache... like someone's playing table tennis with my brain.
Wait, where did I put my keys? My wallet's gone too... Did I even lock my bike at all? I develop software for managing items for .. sake.
Hey, this lady's been cleaning up. Maybe she found my wallet and keys
I'm pretty busy. What's up?

replies.message: I was wondering if you've found my keys and wallet?

messages.message: I found some things, but I don't have time to set up a lost-and-found in this mess. Can you help me with those dirty dishes from the kitchen? Thanks a bunch
When you are done, tell me
Thank you very much for helping. There are some lost-and-found things in the storage room. If the door is locked, just use this key.

replies.message: You receive the key to the storage room.

messages.message: Thank you very much for helping.
The coffee machine is not working again. I'd kill for a coffee.
The last borrel I found something. I'll exchange it for a coffee

replies.message: (This guy has a problem with the coffee)

messages.message: Hey you have a coffee! I NEED IT!!!!

replies.message: Give the coffee to the addict guy

messages.message: Thank you so much! Here you have something in return. I'll let you through now

replies.message: The addict guy returns you your keys!

messages.message: Here are some dirty dishes. I am wondering who is going to clean them.
When I said I was wondering who is going to clean them, I already knew the answer. Me!
HEY! This is my mobile phone. Now I just need to find the rest of my stuff. I should check the other floors
HEY! It is Chuck. The plant!
Ugh! I smell like a human
The post-it reads: Look behind you a three headed monkey!
Do you know the new emergencies phone number?
The post-it reads: I hate baby Mario
This may be helpful for my HUGE headache...
It reads: The lift has been inactive since that incident with the North-Korean spy...
I am Error
Where do I put this? I can't just leave this here...
I'm tired carrying this around. Maybe I should put it back...
Okay, let's get these out of the way. Where do I take them?
Phew, I guess I can drop the crate off here...
Did you enjoy the party?
Those beercrates are blocking the way to the second floor. I hope someone will pick them up soon.
Wow, that was some party last night, huh?
Are you lost? This is the Communications floor.
I can't wait to see the pictures of last night!
This door is locked. You'll need to find a key
Great! The door opens with the key you got from the cleaning lady
What would you like to do?
One hour passed... You feel tired.
You have 1 new email.

replies.message: Let's not go into this now. Log a call.

messages.message: You are making a ticket in TOPerations. What seems to be the problem?

replies.message: The coffee machine is broken, it shows error e1029. Submit your call.

messages.message: Thanks for registering your call. Our coffee machine repairmen will arrive within 15 minutes.
You find 1 knowledge item.

replies.message: I am too tired for this, log a call.

messages.message: You see some pictures from yesterdays party. Apparently there were some uniformed police agents at the party. You wonder why?
Thanks for registering your call. You can get a new phone battery at our ICT department at the 14th floor.
It says log a call, a repairman will come to fix this. The machine has to be opened up and a switch needs to be replaced. Let's log a call.
Choose a racer

With toad's fast acceleration, you start off well. But the heavier racers are starting to overtake you.
There is a risky shortcut over a narrow canyon on the left, or you can take the long road and collect some extra coins
phew, you take the shortcut without the help of Lakitu. But you're still being overtaken.
Good thinking, toad quickly swerves to collect extra coins and gain some extra speed
The race is going well for you. There is a risky shortcut on the left, or you can take the long road and collect some extra coins
Phew, you take the shortcut without the help of Lakitu. But you're still being overtaken.
Good thinking, toad quickly swerves to collect extra coins and gain some extra speed

replies.message: Ok, you got some extra coins but you needed to swerve to get them.

messages.message: DK is a heavy racer, with slow acceleration. You start at the back of the back, but you're gaining speed. There is a risky shortcut on the left, or you can take the long road and collect some extra coins
Good thinking, you need to make up for a slow start. You take the shortcut without the help of Lakitu.
Ok, you got some extra coins but you needed to swerve to get them and now you lost speed
You're almost near the end. You managed to fight your way to first place! You hear a beeping noise coming from behind
You hold back and are quickly overtaken. You lose the game.
You press on. A blue shield destroys you just before the finish. You lose the game
You're almost near the end. You managed to fight your way to first place! You hear a beeping noise coming from behind
You hold back and are quickly overtaken by Baby Mario!. You lose the game.
You press on. A blue shield hits you just before the finish. However, with Toad's fast acceleration, you manage to just stay ahead. You win!
You're almost near the end. You managed to fight your way to first place! You hear a beeping noise coming from behind
Good thinking! Baby mario zooms past you, but then a blue shield comes out of nowhere and blows that little bugger to kingdom come! You win easily!
You are hit by a blue shield. You try to get back into the race but it's too late - baby mario wins the game
You LOST!
You WIN!
